Text.Name: YinYangErosion
Text.Desc: Reduce enemy's defense with Yin Yang Power.

Text.Name: BambooBedFeel
Text.Desc: The bamboo bed feels a bit chilly.

Text.Name: Modifier_YG_YinYangForce
Text.Desc: Rapidly burns the source of life to stimulate the original Yaoguai force in order to drastically increase the artifact mastery, Qi barrier, and secret body power and endurance.

Text.Name: Fish_EndureHunger
Text.Desc: Ate Golden Dwarf Cichlid, can endure hunger.
